page.title: 11CHILDREN'S RECREATION
page.content: In our class we have 20 children aged from 7.5 to 9.75 years. Some girls go to{Brownie Guides}and some boys to{Cub {Scouts.}3 girls go to{ballet}and{tap {dancing,}5 children go{horse riding} and 6 have{swimming lessons.}1 boy races his{motor cycle.}7 children go to{Church}or{Sunday School}each week. In our spare time we like to{collect} things like rubbers, stickers, soft toys, shells, stamps and soaps. Some like{walking}and exploring. We play{ ball{games,}skipping, roller skating and tig games. Indoors we watch{T.V. 6 children use{microcomputers}and 9 children play with{electronic games.} We like board games, jigsaws, dolls and lego. We enjoy colouring, writing, and reading. Some like{making models,} 4 play{musical instruments.}We keep{ and look after{pets}like rabbits, dogs, cats, hamsters and goldfish.
